gps_warning.title: Optimal GPS conditions required
gps_warning.text:
High GPS sample rates require optimal GPS conditions, with clear horizon to horizon view of the sky and no terrain or obstructions.

If you experience erratic speed readings or inaccurate lap times, reduce GPS sample rate to 10Hz or less.

suggested_lap.title: Ready to review data!
suggested_lap.text:
We've selected the best lap and a suggested channel to get you started.

To add more, touch the gear icon for a list of available channels.

analysis_welcome.title: Analysis
analysis_welcome.text: To get started, select a recently recorded session or import a log file.

lap_setup.title: Setting your race track
lap_setup.text: You can select or create a track map later under Setup.

dashboard_gauge_help.title: Customizing your dashboard
dashboard_gauge_help.text:
Touch a gauge to select a channel and set alerts. You can also swipe or use the arrows to switch between dashboard views.

Touch the gear icon for more options!

rc_write_config.title: Write Changes
rc_write_config.text: When done, write your changes back to RaceCapture to apply your settings.
